experiment_config.name: G-M4-Dual
experiment_config.description: GFS两高度分别校正后均权融合

processing_log: 双高度校正融合试验: G-M4-Dual
'G-M4-Dual' 试验特定清理后数据大小: 52317
gfs_10m 风速校正模型输入特征: ['forecast_wind', 'forecast_wind_2', 'other_height_wind', 'wind_shear', 'temperature', 'hour', 'month', 'is_daytime', 'wind_lag_1h', 'wind_lag_24h', 'wind_24h_mean']
gfs_70m 风速校正模型输入特征: ['forecast_wind', 'forecast_wind_2', 'other_height_wind', 'wind_shear', 'temperature', 'hour', 'month', 'is_daytime', 'wind_lag_1h', 'wind_lag_24h', 'wind_24h_mean']
双高度融合功率预测模型输入特征: ['wind', 'wind_2', 'wind_3', 'hour', 'month', 'is_daytime', 'wind_lag_1h', 'wind_lag_24h']
最终测试性能: RMSE=32.6690, 相关系数=0.6286
